Text.Value: Aah! Let go of me!

EditorData.AnimationTags: [player] grabs [Silfy], she screams and fights back unsuccesfully
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Child being shaken by player. She struggles free, and a few trinkets fall to the ground

Text.Value: Right. You def'nately caught me the first and only time I stole.

EditorData.NodeContext: She has stolen from the player before. She is a terrible liar.

Text.Value: I can't give it back, though. It's already in the stash.
Lunge at her. Remorse or not, she tried to rob you.
That's, um, really nice of you.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Silfy jerks her hand out of the player's pack and stares at them, then she bursts into tears, covering her face.

Text.Value: *You see her hand in your bags... and the shame in her heart.*
Something tells me the thieving life isn't for you.
Help!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Escapes the player's grasp, runs away.

Text.Value: Ignore her theatrics and grab her.
One of the big kids.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [player] secures his/her pouches, [Silfy] rubs her eyes and takes a shuddering breath
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: *The child rubbed her eyes and took a shuddering breath.*

Text.Value: Help!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player tries to grab her, but she escapes their grasp.

Text.Value: I guess I'll try harder not to get caught next time. Bye!
Oh. Okay.
Um. Gotta go now.
*You notice she's trembling. The tears streaming down her cheeks are indeed real.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Silfy]  trembling, tears streaming down her cheeks

Text.Value: How... how did you catch me?
Lunge at her. Real tears or not, she tried to rob you.
Relax, I won't get angry. You didn't even manage to get anything from me.
Get out of my sight.
Well now, someone's starting young. Who taught you that?
I can't do this anymore, Mattis! I'm sorry!

EditorData.AnimationTags: tiefling kid rubs her eyes and takes a shuddering breath
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: *The child rubbed her eyes and took a shuddering breath.*
EditorData.NodeContext: *The child rubbed her eyes and took a shuddering breath.*

Text.Value: *Her hands hide her face, preventing you from reading her expression.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: [Silfy] rubs her eyes preventing the player to check
tiefling girl sprints to a hole in the wall and crawls through it
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: |CINEMATIC: NODE: *She sprints away and crawls through a crack in a nearby wall.*|

Text.Value: Observe her silently. Maybe these are just crocodile tears.
I already took some of your stuff. Brought it back to the hideout. I'm so sorry!

EditorData.logicalname: She already robbed the player once.

Text.Value: Wow. Thank you!
I... feel like I should say that I already took some of your stuff. Before now, I mean.
N-no! What are you doing?
Read her thoughts.
You don't have what it takes to be a villain. Kill while you smile, steal like you breathe.
How else? You're clumsy. A dead man could've caught you.
*You suddenly feel something moving against your back and turn.*

EditorData.AnimationTags: pc feels movement behind him and hastily turns around
EditorData.SFXTags: sound that indicates someone sneaking behind player

Text.Value: Nuh-uh.

EditorData.logicalname: She already robbed the player once.

Text.Value: You were just unlucky this time. But you've got talent - I can tell.

Synopsis: Non-critpath. Occurs when the player catches the small tiefling girl (7-9 years old) is stealing from them. The player can grab and shake her, as per design.
